title: Disney Music - Lava (Official Lyric Video from "Lava")
colours_reason:

Color 1 reason:  The lyrics mention "lava" which is often depicted as a fiery orange color.
Color 2: #800080 reason: The lyrics mention "stone" which can be a dark gray or purple color.
Color 3 reason: The lyrics mention "sea" which is often depicted as a turquoise or cyan color.

Color 5 reason: The lyrics mention "earth" which can be associated with a green color.
